price: Allahn Isa malee dhugaan gabbaramaan hin jiruInni Gooftaa arshii guddaati.” {1}
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
footnotes: {1} bakka kana sujuuda qaraatii qur'aanaattu jira.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
